[[Version_2.0.6|WordPress Version 2.0.6]] consists mainly of minor bugfixes, minor feature enhancement, and security fixes (multiple XSS issues and a potential SQL injection issue).
.

There is a known bug related to Feedburner, but [http://markjaquith.wordpress.com/2007/01/06/wordpress-206-feedburner-issue-and-fix/ a workaround is available] in the form of a fix to '''wp-includes/functions.php'''.

==Changesets==
